Thank you for the upload, but this file doesn't seem to work. It's a hdtv.xvid-tla.rar file. I use VLC media player, which plays most files.

Is there a workaround that someone knows of? I love this series, and would like to see this episode before I watch the last one.
its a compressed file. u need a program to un zip it. i use IZArc.
